sentences.en: I don't feel that anyone can kick me around anymore.
sentences.cn: 我认为没人敢再欺负我了。

sentences.en: I don't like to entertain guests anymore.
sentences.cn: 我再也不想招待客人了。

sentences.en: I don't react anymore when opponents try to niggle me.
sentences.cn: 对手找茬惹我时，我不会再理他们。

sentences.en: I don't ride my motorbike much anymore.
sentences.cn: 我不怎么骑我的摩托车了。

sentences.en: I don't trust my father anymore.
If you take my work away I can'tbe happy anymore.
sentences.cn: 如果你炒我鱿鱼，我就再也高兴不起来了。

sentences.en: It was a rude awakening to learn after I left home that I wasn't so special anymore.
sentences.cn: 离家后我才猛然意识到自己不再有什么特别。

sentences.en: Maybe you shouldn't eat in that restaurant anymore.
sentences.cn: 也许你不该再去那家餐厅吃饭了。

sentences.en: My main complaint is that we can't go out on the racecourse anymore.
sentences.cn: 我投诉的主要问题是我们没法再去外面的赛道了。

sentences.en: People are not interested in movies anymore.
sentences.cn: 人们不再对电影感兴趣了。

sentences.en: She told me not to phone her anymore.
sentences.cn: 她叫我不要再给她打电话。

sentences.en: They've changed a lot of the old street names, and people can't find their way anymore.
sentences.cn: 许多老的街道名都被改了，人们再也找不到原来的路了。
